meanings.sent1: In case of any eventuality, we have a backup plan.
meanings.sent2: The team prepared for every eventuality before the big game.
meanings.sent3: The eventuality of a sudden rainstorm made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The eventuality of winning the lottery seemed like a dream.
meanings.sent5: She always considers every eventuality to avoid surprises.

meanings.definition: The state or fact of being eventual
meanings.sent1: The eventuality of his promotion brought joy to the office.
meanings.sent2: We are all waiting for the eventuality of summer vacation.
meanings.sent3: The eventuality of a snow day made the students excited.
meanings.sent4: The eventuality of success motivated him to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The eventuality of a new beginning filled her with hope.
